GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
blk-iolatency: Fix inflight count imbalances and IO hangs on offline

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit a30acbb5dfb7bcc813ad6a18ca31011ac44e5547, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit 8c772a9bfc7c07c76f4a58b58910452fbb20843b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: blk-iolatency: Fix inflight count imbalances and IO hangs on offline
